add.title: Add product to wish list
add.description: Select a wish list in which you want to add the product

remove.title: Edit linked wish lists
remove.description: Select wish lists in which you want to add the product

cookie.name: wish list
cookie.description: For creating and using a wish list

form.name: Name:
form.editableDescription: Once enabled, users (who have subscribed to the wish list) can edit, delete and add products from/to the wish list.
form.privateDescription: As soon as this is activated, products purchased by the subscribed user will disappear from the wish list.
form.birthdayDescription: If this is not activated, the wish list is public and can be viewed by any user (unless a password has been set).

form.name: Name:
form.editableDescription: Once enabled, users (who have subscribed to the wish list) can edit, delete and add products from/to the wish list.
form.privateDescription: As soon as this is activated, products purchased by the subscribed user will disappear from the wish list.
form.birthdayDescription: If this is not activated, the wish list is public and can be viewed by any user (unless a password has been set).

shareWishlist.title: Share wish list "%name%"
shareWishlist.description: With the following link you can share your wish list
shareWishlist.privateError: You have to set you wish list to public in order to share it

deleteWishlist.title: Delete wish list "%name%"
deleteWishlist.description: Are you sure you to delete this wish list?

password.enterPasswordDescription: Enter the password for the wish list

moveProductModal.title: Edit wish list assignment
moveProductModal.description: Move products to one ore more wish lists

errorCodes.1: you have to pass a wish list ID
errorCodes.2: you have no permission to add or delete products on this wish list
errorCodes.3: you have no permission to see this wish list
errorCodes.4: you have no permissions to set settings for this wish list
errorCodes.5: You have no rights to use the birthday function.
errorCodes.6: The customer ID must be transmitted.
errorCodes.7: The wish list ID does not exist.
errorCodes.9: The wish list is not available in this sales channel.
errorCodes.10: The wish list could not be found.
errorCodes.12: Wrong password for the wish list
errorCodes.13: This wish list is not subscribable (not editable and no birthday functionality activated)
errorCodes.14: You already have a wish list with this name.

noProducts.title: Unfortunately you have no products on your wish list.
noProducts.desc: Add products to your wish list now!

success.subscribed: You have successfully subscribed to a wish list.
